title: Grade 5 exam results to be released tonight
body_lines: Education Minister Dinesh Gunawardana said he intends to contact the relevant authorities to release the grade five scholarship examination results by tonight.
Addressing the media at an event, he said the ministry is to release the 2021 (2022) GCE Advanced Level (A/L) as soon as possible.
The Minister said after releasing the results, the students will be able to continue with their studies. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
